name: KnowShow
0:
”Alexa, open know show”
”Alexa, start know show”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: know show
des: Play an interesting game of quiz with Alexa. While playing the quiz, you can say "Alexa, next" to move to the next question. At any point, you can say "Alexa, stop" to exit the quiz.
priv: Your requests to this skill are not shared with the skill developer.
